name: AbsentMindedGenius
description: This engineer is a master of their craft.. albeit inattentive. They have a higher chance of increasing their Expertise stat, but a lower chance of increasing Precision when switching careers.

name: Aerodynamicist
description: This engineer knows that in racing physics is your greatest ally. Chassis parts built or tuned by this engineeer gain the following bonuses: +20 bonus on Chassis performance +1 bonus on Chassis tuning

name: AvantGarde
description: This engineer is in their space when experimenting with new ideas. When building an experimental car it receives a +10% to the higher limit and a -10% to the lower limit.

name: Broker
description: This engineer knows how to get the best deals. Building new parts costs 10% less.

name: DesignMaster
description: This engineer has mastered the craft of every aspect of a racing car. All parts built by them gain 20 Performance added to the final result.

name: DriverRapport
description: This Engineer builds trust between them and their team. Their drivers have a +1 to their Focus

name: DriversAreIdiots
description: This engineer feels like their work is not appreciated. Their drivers receive a -1 to their Focus.

name: Finesse
description: This engineer knows that proper handling is key. Handling parts built or tuned by this engineeer gain the following bonuses: 20 Performance added to the final result of built parts, +1 minimum value for tuned parts.

name: PartsPerfect
description: This engineer does not take suggestions to their tuning skills well. Parts tuned by them have a -1 subtracted to the minimum value.

name: Perfectionist
description: Thisengineer will stop at nothing short of perfection. They have a higher chance of increasing their Precision stat, but a Lower chance of increasing Expertise when switching careers.

name: PowerHungry
description: This engineer's cars pack a punch. Engines built or tuned by this engineeer gain the following bonuses: 20 Performance added to the final result of built parts +1 minimum value for tuned parts.

name: Strategist
description: This engineer knows how to prepare their cars for all situations. Cars built by them degrade 10% slower.

name: Traditionalist
description: This engineer dislikes leaving their comfort zone. When building an experimental car it receives a -10% to the higher limit and a +10% to the lower limit.

name: TuningMaster
description: This engineer  has mastered their tuning techniques to perfection. Parts tuned by them have a +1 added to the minimum value.

name: Wasteful
description: This engineer is prone to wasting materials. Building new parts costs 10% more.

name: WorkOutKinks
description: This engineer is not bothered by subpar work. All parts built by them receive a -20 Performance to the final result.
